subject: Golf
Leukemia
lead_paragraph: Jarrod Lyle of Australia, who underwent a double umbilical cord blood transplant in 2012 after his second bout with acute myeloid leukemia, is back playing again.
snippet: Jarrod Lyle of Australia, who underwent a double umbilical cord blood transplant in 2012 after his second bout with acute myeloid leukemia, is back playing again.
